definition: lit. pull up a plant and the roots follow (idiom); fig. also involving others/inextricably tangled together/Invite one and he'll tell all his friends.
to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to eat/(extended meaning) to endure/putrid smell/vegetables/roots (inextricably attached to the plant)
